title: Textile, late 17th century - early 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton on cotton
Technique: embroidery
description: Border for an alb. Very sheer white cotton; embroidered in white cotton. Design symmetrically arranged, of delicate flowering vine, originating in an urn; below dogs and lions rampant, above birds. Second motif: shield with figure of a child on a wheel. Above shield, helmet with closed visor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 17th century - early 18th century.Medium: cotton on cotton
Technique: embroidery. 1951-134-2.
